post:
Hostpoco.com has been providing quality web hosting solutions to businesses and individuals. Our goal is to provide outstanding services for the best possible price. To achieve these goals we are constantly innovating and upgrading our services at no additional cost to our customers. We believe that quality support is a way to go in hosting business!

Now we are starting VPS hosting from $14.99/month, we will give you professional service and 24/7/365 support, also We're deploying premium Intel Xeon servers with full-SSD / HDD storage in premium data centers connected to redundant Tier 1 internet providers and all our VPS hosting plans come with full root access, dedicated IP, free RDNS and free re-installations.

*Our plan and features:
------------------------------------
VPS Startup:$14.99 /Monthly
------------------------------------
~1024 MB Memory
~VPS Type OpenVZ
~30 GB Raid 10 Storage
~2 TB Monthly Traffic
~1 IPv4 included (all ports open)
~cPanel/whm License $14 /month
~DirectAdmin license $8 /month
~Additional IP address $2.50 /month/IP
~Free Setup
~99 % Uptime Guarantee
~24/7 Live Support
~Root / SSH Access

If you have any questions, please visit our site
https://hostpoco.com/

Thank You.
